ClubPage.intro:
<h>What is it?</h>
<par>Club de Bordado is a community of embroiderers based in CDMX (but with members throughout Mexico and the world).</par>
<h>What is it about?</h>
<par>In addition to being in constant communication through our Facebook group, we organize monthly gatherings in different parts of the city in order to meet and create ties with people who enjoy embroidery, these are NOT classes. </par>
<par> ** As a result of the current situation (we will only have virtual sessions). **</par>
<par>It does not matter your level or experience but it is necessary that you already know some stitches so that you can share your projects with the group.</par>
ClubPage.benefits: <h>Other benefits ...</h><list><bullet>You will have a 10% discount on direct purchases of materials and embroidery kits from Silvia Peligro (<txtLink href='{{url}}' target='_blank'>@speligro</txtLink>).</bullet><bullet>You will have access to exclusive embroidery patterns.</bullet></list>

LocalShipping.headerTitle: How to place your order with shipping within Mexico City?
LocalShipping.clubPromo: With your member number receive a 10% discount on your order
LocalShipping.intro:
<par>This shipping is available if the delivery address is within the 16 municipalities of the CDMX.</par>
<par>Every week I will be receiving orders on Thursdays and Fridays from 11 am to 6 pm (deliveries are on Tuesdays).</par>
LocalShipping.step1:
Send me a list of what you would like to buy by private message on instagram @speligro , include your zip code to quote your shipping.
Minimum purchase 150 Mexican pesos.
LocalShipping.howToOrder: How to write my order? Click here.
LocalShipping.orderIndications:
<par>Send me your order written in the body of your message, <bold> do not send photos or screenshots </bold>. </par>
<par>Write your <bold> request as a list </bold>, avoid sending in linear form.</par>
<par>Tell me the number of units as follows <bold> (number of pieces) product </bold>if it is only a piece it is not necessary to indicate it.</par>
LocalShipping.step2: In response to your message I will confirm if I have all the products on your list, I will also tell you the cost of your shipping and I will share the bank details with you so you can make the transfer or deposit.
LocalShipping.step3:
Once the payment is done I need a photo or screenshot of your payment receipt and the following data:
<list><bullet> Name of who will receive the package </bullet><bullet> Cell number </bullet><bullet> Delivery address </bullet></list>
LocalShipping.step4:
<par> If you send your receipt voucher before 6pm on Monday, your order will be shipped on Tuesday of the same week.</par>
<par>On Tuesday you will receive a message on your cell phone from Dostavista with the information of your delivery, the delivery schedule is from 12 to 7 pm.</par>
